titleStmt.title: The full tryals, examination, and condemnation of four notorious witches at the assizes held at Worcester, on Tuesday the 4th of March with the manner, how they were found guilty of bewitching several children to death, as also, their confessions, and last dying speeches at the place of execution, with other amazing particulars concerning the said witchcraft.

notesStmt.note: Date of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
